title: 135. Do Baby Girls Cause Divorce?
description: Even American parents have a strong "son preference" -- which means that a newborn daughter can be bad news for a marriage.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Even American parents have a strong "son preference" -- which means that a newborn daughter can be bad news for a marriage.
